sep.gaia.resources

Interface ResourceObserver<R extends DataResource>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of resources this observer receives on update. Necessary for the connection of layer classes (View) and resources (Model).
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompassAdapter, CopyrightAdapter, MarkerAdapter, POIAdapter, ResourceAdapter, TileAdapter, WeatherAdapter, WikipediaAdapter

    public interface ResourceObserver<R extends DataResource>
    Interface which is implemented by resource-observing classes like the ResourceAdapter class.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer (Spezifikation: Matthias Fisch)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClear()
      Called by the ResourceObservable to notify about a subsequent update with new data.
      void onUpdate(java.util.Collection<R> resources)
      Called by the ResourceObservable object to notify ResourceObserver implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • onUpdate

        void onUpdate(java.util.Collection<R> resources)
        Called by the ResourceObservable object to notify ResourceObserver implementations. It is not guaranteed that this method is called in the same thread as the registering method.
        Parameters:
        resources - A Collection of current used DataResource objects. "Used" means that a State indicates, these DataResource objects are necessary for the application at this specific situation.

      • onClear

        void onClear()
        Called by the ResourceObservable to notify about a subsequent update with new data.
